Declare @xmlEC xml

Delete From dbo.tblTargetingConfig Where DimPoolID = @DimPoolId and DimECID = @DimECID
insert tblTargetingConfig(DimPoolId, DimECID, TargetType, TargetName, TargetValue, TargetTolerance, TargetOriginalValue) Select @DimPoolID, @DimECID, t.c.value(''''@Name[1]'''', ''''varchar(50)''''), t.c.value(''''@Name[1]'''', ''''varchar(50)''''), t.c.value(''''@Value[1]'''', ''''money''''), @TargetTolerance, t.c.value(''''@Value[1]'''', ''''money'''') From @xmlEC.nodes(''''/main/Parameters/Parameter[@Name="PoolSize"]'''') As t(c)
End ' SET @BigSQL = 'USE [' + @DBName + ']; EXEC sp_executesql N''' + @vchSQL + ''''; --PRINT @BigSQL EXEC (@BigSQL)
